PAU Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 16:22 IST
 Punjab Agricultural University
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Punjab |  Salary : 37,000 to 37,000




FOLLOW

Punjab Agricultural University (PAU) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the PAU Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection Process, Salary Structure, Education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Punjab.

PAU Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria.
Name of the Posts	N.of Vacancies	Qualification
Junior Research Fellow	01	B.Sc, M.Sc

Age Limit for the PAU Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the PAU Recruitment 2025 

Interview

Salary Structure for the PAU Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 37,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the PAU Recruitment 2025 

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the PAU Recruitment 2025 
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Junior Research Fellow Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the address given below.

Address

Head Dept. of Plant Breeding & Genetics, Punjab Agricultural University, Ludhiana.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	24-08-2025
Last Date of Application	29-08-2025

 

Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
